name: Montego Bay Irie Blue Hole
description:
Take a scenic drive east of Falmouth to the Irie Blue Hole.
An off the beaten path up in the mountains through the rainforest to experience a one of a kind water falls undoubtedly one of jamaica's hidden gem fill with adventure for the entire family. Journey to the Windsor Mineral Springs aka the Fire Water and experience fire on top of water. Here you can get a fully body massage or just place your feet or hands under the water where the fire is without getting burn.
